price: (41) And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, Satan has touched me with hardship and torment."
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بِنُصۡبٖ وَعَذَابٍ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-shayṭānu binuṣ'bin waʿadhābin
